content: @Chris Grenz re GF#9648 - what is wrong with the examples on http://hl7-fhir.github.io/extensibility-examples.html?

Nothing (or very little) wrong with them, just not complete:

  • The 3 step process should include the optional step of including the extension in a profile.
  • The complex extension needs the 2nd two parts - use in a Patient profile and use in the Patient instance.
  • Need examples for an extension of an extension.

One issue I see - the use of valueUri in an extension profile does not adequately constrain the value of the extension - value[x] must be included with the types limited (see first example, others later).
And of course all this needs to be updated with the id/name updates.
Might be easier to create some test profiles and include them as examples (so they are built by the tool)?
Not sure where the proper place is for slicing of/by extension??
